Articles.Content: I see that asteroid days is the "second official kerbal mod". What is the first official mod?

The first official mod added soccer balls (or football depending on where you're from) to the game in honor of the world cup. The mod is aptly called "Kerbin Cup"

[http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/221319-kerbin-cup](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/221319-kerbin-cup)

Also, welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

~Claw

[http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/221319-kerbin-cup](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/221319-kerbin-cup)

The Kerbin Cup, released to commemorate the 2014 World Cup.

Of course, what *someone* did next might be obvious.
